channel.title: Sicss on Marta Kołczyńska
channel.description: Recent content in Sicss on Marta Kołczyńska

item.title: Applause and laughter in TED talks with tidytext
item.description: Setup tidy TED talks Applause, LOL Sentiment This year I spent two weeks of the summer attending the Summer Institute for Computational Social Science Parter Site (SICSS) in Tvärminne and Helsinki, Finland, organized by Matti Nelimarkka from Aalto University and the University of Helsinki assisted by two TAs: Juho Pääkkönen and Pihla Toivanen from the University of Helsinki. The summer institute brought together 19 graduate students and postdoctoral researchers representing the social sciences and computer sciences.

item.title: ISA World Congress 2018: Analysis of tweets
item.description: Getting data from Twitter Tweets over time Text analysis Tweets by ISA Resesarch Committee The International Sociological Association 19th World Congress of Sociology in Toronto (15-21 July) has received quite some Twitter coverage. Waiting to board the flight back to Warsaw, I wanted to take a look at these Twitter data and apply the newly acquired skills in text analysis (thanks to the Summer Institute for Computational Social Science, SICSS, Partner Site in Tvärminne and Helsinki, Finland).
